original_text: But Jeroboam caused an ambushment to come about behind them: so they were before Judah, and the ambushment was behind them.
korean_text: 여로보암이 유다의 뒤를 둘러 복병하였으므로 그 앞에는 이스라엘 사람들이 있고 그 뒤에는 복병이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: But Jeroboam caused an ambushment to come about behind them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여로보암은 그들 뒤에 복병을 두게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: and the ambushment was behind them
